full_translation:
**The Supreme Jade Register of the Primordial Beginning**

**Scripture Title:** *The Supreme Jade Register of the Primordial Beginning*
Author unknown, approximately composed during the Northern and Southern Dynasties. One scroll.
Source text: *Daoist Canon of the Zhengtong Era*, *Dongzhen* Section, *Pulu* Category.

In the first year of *Qingxu*, the year *gengyin*, on the ninth day of the ninth month, at the hour of *shangjia*, the Primordial Heavenly King observed a prolonged fast at the *Shangqing* Palace. He swore an oath to the Most High, the Boundless, the Formless, the Nameless, the Unoriginated, the Limitless, and the luminous clarity of the supreme natural state spanning countless kalpas.

The Dao transmitted *The Three Primordials’ Jade Register* to the Jade Lads of the Three Heavens, entrusting it to later disciples whose mystic names destined them to become *Shangqing* Perfected Ones. Their names were inscribed upon the cinnabar terrace of the Golden Treasury and the jade tablets, written in purple script upon jasper slips. They were to welcome the Sage Lords, soaring to the *Shangqing* Palace, gazing upon the celestial and terrestrial offices of the *Dongqing*’s natural hierarchy. There, they would serve the Supreme Perfected, inspecting Heaven, Earth, and humanity, summoning immortals, subduing demons, commanding spirits, and descending in cloud chariots to receive the bodies of those who would inherit the Dharma, in accordance with the covenant of the *Nine Perfected* and the *Mystic Statutes*.

**Left Flying Immortals of the Supreme Dongqing’s Primal Chaos and Natural State:** Nine thousand *Xu Shilang* (Void Attendants).
**Right Flying Immortals of the Supreme Dongqing’s Primal Chaos and Natural State:** Nine thousand *Xu Shilang* (Void Attendants).
All talismans inscribed in azure script.

**Supreme Vacuous Primordial Venerable Lord of the Dao, the Heavenly Master:** Personal name, *Hun*.
**Supreme Nine Mysteries Primordial Heavenly King Lord of the Dao:** Personal name, *Dong*.
**Supreme Great Vacuity Nine Heavens Venerable Lord of the Dao:** Personal name, *Kai*.
**Supreme Mystic Vacuity Nine Heavens Perfected King Lord of the Dao:** Personal name, *Yu*.
**Supreme Vacuous Primal Chaos Nine Heavens Primordial Father Lord of the Dao:** Personal name, *Dao*.
**Supreme Vacuous Natural Nine Heavens Perfected Mother Lord of the Dao:** Personal name, *Dun*.
**Supreme Jade Treasure Nine Empyreans Heavenly Perfected Venerable Lord of the Dao:** Personal name, *Kui*.
**Supreme Purple Vacuity Radiant Nine Empyreans Great Vacuity Jade Emperor Lord of the Dao:** Personal name, *Chuan*.
**Supreme Jade Vacuity Lord of the Ten Thousand Beginnings, the Venerable Master:** Personal name, *Lang Lan*.
**King Lord of the Dao of the Immeasurable Heaven of *Yudan*:** Personal name, *Jun Luo*.
**King Lord of the Dao of the Immeasurable Longevity Heaven of Supreme Meditation and Goodness:** Personal name, *Yang Jun Le*.
**King Lord of the Dao of the *Fan Jian* Heaven:** Personal name, *Shi Tou Yuanque*.
**King Lord of the Dao of the *Dou Shu* Heaven:** Personal name, *Zu Gui Qing*.
**Lord of the Dao of the *Bu Jiao Le* Heaven:** Personal name, *Te*.
**King Lord of the Dao of the *Hua Yingsheng* Heaven:** Personal name, *Han Yue*.
**King Lord of the Dao of the *Fan Bao* Heaven:** Personal name, *Wu Zi*.
**King Lord of the Dao of the *Fan Mo Jia Yi* Heaven:** Personal name, *Ning Hong*.
**King Lord of the Dao of the *Bo Li Da He* Heaven:** Personal name, *Ling Yuan*.

**Jade Clarity Three Heavens Venerable Lord of the Dao:** Personal name, *Ding Mei*.
**Jade Clarity Three Heavens Jade Lad Lord of the Dao:** Personal name, *Zheng Lan*.
**Jade Clarity Supreme Vacuous August Lord of the Dao:** Personal name, *Zao*.
**Jade Clarity Purple Vacuity Supreme Primordial August Lord of the Dao:** Personal name, *Ji*.
**Jade Clarity Supreme August Jade Vacuity Lord of the Dao:** Personal name, *Xin*.
**Jade Clarity Cavernous Vacuity Three Primordials Great Radiance Supreme August Lord of the Dao:** Personal name, *Xin Ping*.
**Jade Clarity August Supreme Jade Emperor Lord of the Dao:** Personal name, *Ning*.
**Jade Clarity Supreme Primordial High Vacuity Supreme Ultimate Purple August Lord of the Dao:** Personal name, *Lian*.
**Jade Clarity Vacuous Brightness Purple Orchid Primordial Center Lofty Perfected August Lord of the Dao:** Personal name, *Zhi*.
**Purple Vacuity Jade Emperor Venerable Master of the Purple Dawn Lord of the Dao:** Personal name, *Qi*.
**Purple Vacuity Three Primordials Purple Essence Lord of the Dao:** Personal name, *Hui*.
**Purple Vacuity Perfected Yang Primordial Elder Mystic Unity Lord of the Dao:** Personal name, *Yan*.
**Purple Vacuity Supreme August Venerable Master of the Purple Dawn Lord of the Dao:** Personal name, *Xin San Dong*.
**Purple Vacuity August Supreme Great Emperor Lord of the Dao:** Personal name, *Gu*.
**Purple Vacuity August Elder Supreme Lord Lord of the Dao:** Personal name, *Ying*.
**Purple Vacuity Pure Numinous Yang Abode Primordial Lord of the Dao:** Personal name, *Fa*.
**Purple Vacuity August Clarity Cavernous Perfected Lord of the Dao:** Personal name, *Zong*.
**Purple Vacuity Primordial Numinous Supreme Primordial Lord of the Dao:** Personal name, *Tong*.
**Purple Vacuity Northern Mystery Supreme Vacuous August Lord of the Dao:** Personal name, *Tong*.
**Purple Vacuity Southern Vermilion Supreme Vacuous August Lord of the Dao:** Personal name, *Jing*.
**Purple Clarity Western Florescence Supreme Vacuous August Lord of the Dao:** Personal name, *Ban*.
**Purple Clarity Eastern Brilliance Supreme Vacuous August Lord of the Dao:** Personal name, *Chang*.
**Purple Clarity Central Primordial Embracing Numinous Vacuous August Lord of the Dao:** Personal name, *Cheng*.
**Purple Clarity Five Numinous Seven Luminants Primal Birth Supreme Vacuous August Lord of the Dao:** Personal name, *Zhu*.
**Purple Vacuity Three Primordials Supreme Mystic Elder Vacuous August Primordial Dawn Lord of the Dao:** Personal name, *Ying*.
**Purple Clarity Mystic Quiescence Nine Primordials Supreme Vacuous August Lord of the Dao:** Personal name, *Shi*.
**Purple Clarity Great Brilliance Numinous Radiance Center Perfected Supreme Lord of the Dao:** Personal name, *Qing*.
**High Clarity Three Primordials Four Poles Mystic Primordial Vacuous August Lord of the Clouds:** Personal name, *Weng*.
**High Clarity Three Primordials Dawn Center Yellow Radiance Vacuous August Primordial Terrace Lord of the Dao:** Personal name, *Jing*.

**Supreme Cavern Clarity Primal Chaos Spontaneous Eastern Azure Emperor Yuanhuang Perfected, Nine Thousand in Number;**
**Supreme Cavern Clarity Primal Chaos Spontaneous Southern Vermilion Emperor Yuanhuang Perfected, Nine Thousand in Number;**
**Supreme Cavern Clarity Primal Chaos Spontaneous Western White Emperor Yuanhuang Perfected, Nine Thousand in Number;**

**Supreme Cavern Clarity Primal Chaos Spontaneous Nine Mysteries Upper Clarity Jade Vacuity Flying Immortal Envoys, Nine Thousand in Number;**
**Supreme Cavern Clarity Primal Chaos Spontaneous Upper Clarity Jade Vacuity Flying Immortal Jade Gentlemen, Nine Thousand in Number;**
**Supreme Cavern Clarity Primal Chaos Spontaneous Upper Clarity Jade Vacuity Envoys, Nine Thousand Each;**
**Supreme Cavern Clarity Primal Chaos Spontaneous Upper Clarity Jade Vacuity Envoys and Grand Immortal Envoys, Nine Thousand Each;**
**Supreme Cavern Clarity Primal Chaos Spontaneous Upper Clarity Jade Vacuity Upper Yuan Envoys, Nine Thousand in Number;**

**Supreme Cavern Clarity Primal Chaos Spontaneous Upper Clarity Jade Vacuity Lower Yuan Envoys, Nine Thousand in Number;**
**Supreme Cavern Clarity Primal Chaos Spontaneous Jade Clarity Golden Dawn Jade Lads, Nine Thousand Each;**
**Supreme Cavern Clarity Primal Chaos Spontaneous Jade Clarity Great Florescence Jade Maidens, Nine Thousand Each;**
**Supreme Cavern Clarity Primal Chaos Spontaneous Jade Clarity Upper Perfected Assistant Immortals, Nine Thousand Each.**

**Supreme Cavern Clarity Purple Vacuity Cavern Spontaneous Flying Auroral Jade Immortal Qi, Ninety Thousand Layers;**
**Supreme Cavern Clarity Purple Vacuity Cavern Spontaneous Three Essences Flying Cloud Mist, Ninety Thousand Layers;**
**Supreme Cavern Clarity Purple Vacuity Cavern Spontaneous Five-Colored Flowing Rosy Cloud Mist, Ninety Thousand Layers;**
**Supreme Cavern Clarity Purple Vacuity Cavern Spontaneous Azure Emperor Flying Wheel Flowing Mist, Ninety Thousand Layers;**
**Supreme Cavern Clarity Purple Vacuity Cavern Spontaneous Vermilion Emperor Flying Wheel Flowing Mist, Ninety Thousand Layers;**

**Supreme Cavern Clarity Purple Vacuity Cavern Spontaneous Vermilion Emperor Flying Jade Feathered Canopy, Ninety Thousand Layers;**
**Supreme Cavern Clarity Purple Vacuity Cavern Spontaneous White Emperor Flying Jade Feathered Canopy, Ninety Thousand Layers;**
**Supreme Cavern Clarity Purple Vacuity Cavern Spontaneous Black Emperor Flying Jade Feathered Canopy, Ninety Thousand Layers;**
**Supreme Cavern Clarity Purple Vacuity Cavern Spontaneous Yellow Emperor Flying Jade Feathered Canopy, Ninety Thousand Layers;**
**Supreme Cavern Clarity Purple Vacuity Cavern Eastern Marchmount Green Chariot-Yoke Flying Carriage, Ninety Thousand Layers;**
**Supreme Cavern Clarity Purple Vacuity Cavern Southern Marchmount Cinnabar Chariot-Yoke Flying Plough, Ninety Thousand Layers;**
**Supreme Cavern Clarity Purple Vacuity Cavern Western Marchmount Plain Chariot-Yoke Flying Carriage, Ninety Thousand Layers;**
**Supreme Cavern Clarity Purple Vacuity Cavern Northern Marchmount Mystic Chariot-Yoke Flying Carriage, Ninety Thousand Layers;**
**Supreme Cavern Clarity Purple Vacuity Cavern Central Marchmount Yellow Chariot-Yoke Flying Carriage, Ninety Thousand Layers;**
**Supreme Cavern Clarity Purple Vacuity Cavern Spontaneous Upper Yuan Jade Perfected Qi, Ninety Thousand Layers;**
**Supreme Cavern Clarity Purple Vacuity Cavern Spontaneous Middle Yuan Jade Perfected Qi, Ninety Thousand Layers;**
**Supreme Cavern Clarity Purple Vacuity Cavern Spontaneous Lower Yuan Jade Perfected Qi, Ninety Thousand Layers;**
**Supreme Cavern Clarity Purple Vacuity Cavern Spontaneous Upper Yuan Lord Jade Perfected Qi, Ninety Thousand Layers;**
**Supreme Cavern Clarity Purple Vacuity Cavern Spontaneous Middle Yuan Lord Jade Perfected Qi, Ninety Thousand Layers;**
**Supreme Cavern Clarity Purple Vacuity Cavern Spontaneous Lower Yuan Lord Jade Perfected Qi, Ninety Thousand Layers.**

**Nine Heavens Mystic Origin Great Void Cavern Vacuity Spontaneous Celestial Inspector Assistant Perfected Flying Riders, Nine Hundred Million Myriads in Number;**
**Nine Heavens Mystic Origin Great Void Cavern Vacuity Spontaneous Celestial Inspector Assistant Spirit Flying Riders, Nine Hundred Million Myriads in Number;**
**Nine Heavens Mystic Origin Great Void Cavern Vacuity Spontaneous Celestial Inspector Assistant Emperor Flying Riders, Nine Hundred Million Myriads in Number;**
**Nine Heavens Mystic Origin Great Void Cavern Vacuity Spontaneous Celestial Inspector Assistant Numinous Flying Riders, Nine Hundred Million Myriads in Number;**
**Nine Heavens Mystic Origin Great Void Cavern Vacuity Spontaneous Azure Emperor Flying Wheel Sky-Strategem Riders, Nine Hundred Million Myriads in Number;**
**Nine Heavens Mystic Origin Great Void Cavern Vacuity Spontaneous Vermilion Emperor Flying Wheel Sky-Strategem Riders, Nine Hundred Million Myriads in Number;**
**Nine Heavens Mystic Origin Great Void Cavern Vacuity Spontaneous White Emperor Flying Wheel Sky-Strategem Riders, Nine Hundred Million Myriads in Number;**
**Nine Heavens Mystic Origin Great Void Cavern Vacuity Spontaneous Black Emperor Flying Wheel Sky-Strategem Riders, Nine Hundred Million Myriads in Number;**
**Nine Heavens Mystic Origin Great Void Cavern Vacuity Spontaneous Yellow Emperor Flying Wheel Sky-Strategem Riders, Nine Hundred Million Myriads in Number;**
**Nine Heavens Mystic Origin Great Void Cavern Vacuity Spontaneous Eastern Marchmount Flying Soaring Sky Riders, Nine Hundred Million Myriads in Number;**
**Nine Heavens Mystic Origin Great Void Cavern Vacuity Spontaneous Southern Marchmount Flying Soaring Sky Riders, Nine Hundred Million Myriads in Number;**
**Nine Heavens Mystic Origin Great Void Cavern Vacuity Spontaneous Western Marchmount Flying Soaring Sky Riders, Nine Hundred Million Myriads in Number;**
**Nine Heavens Mystic Origin Great Void Cavern Vacuity Spontaneous Northern Marchmount Flying Soaring Sky Riders, Nine Hundred Million Myriads in Number;**
**Nine Heavens Mystic Origin Great Void Cavern Vacuity Spontaneous Central Marchmount Flying Soaring Sky Riders, Nine Hundred Million Myriads in Number;**
**Nine Heavens Mystic Origin Great Void Cavern Vacuity Spontaneous Flying Chariot-Yoke Green Carriage Rein-Strategem Riders, Nine Hundred Million Myriads in Number;**
**Nine Heavens Mystic Origin Great Void Cavern Vacuity Spontaneous Flying Chariot-Yoke Feathered Canopy Rein-Strategem Riders, Nine Hundred Million Myriads in Number;**
**Nine Heavens Mystic Origin Great Void Cavern Vacuity Spontaneous Flying Heaven Controlling Earth Dragon-Soaring Riders, Nine Hundred Million Myriads in Number;**
**Nine Heavens Mystic Origin Great Void Cavern Vacuity Spontaneous Flying Heaven Summoning Perfected Birth-Mushroom Jade Maiden-Officials, Nine Hundred Million Myriads in Number;**
**Nine Heavens Mystic Origin Great Void Cavern Vacuity Spontaneous Divine Perfected Immortal Officials, Nine Hundred Million Myriads in Number;**
**Nine Heavens Mystic Origin Great Void Cavern Vacuity Spontaneous Divine Essence Flowing Light Radiant Lightning Riders, Nine Hundred Million Myriads in Number;**
**Nine Heavens Mystic Origin Great Void Cavern Vacuity Spontaneous Yin Essence Ascending Clouds Descending Rain Riders, Nine Hundred Million Myriads in Number;**
**Nine Heavens Mystic Origin Great Void Cavern Vacuity Spontaneous Cloud Gate Holding Tallies Commanding Light Riders, Nine Hundred Million Myriads in Number;**
**Nine Heavens Mystic Origin Great Void Cavern Vacuity Spontaneous Yang Brightness Radiating Pursuing Lightning Riders, Nine Hundred Million Myriads in Number.**

**The Statutes and Ordinances of the Most High Lord Lao;**
**The Jade Tallies of the Supreme Origin’s Loftiest Registers, Complete.**

chunks.original_text: 元始高上玉检大箓 经名：元始高上玉检大箓。 撰人不详，约出於南北朝。 一卷。 底本出处：《正统道藏》洞真部谱录类 元始高上玉检大箓 清虚元年岁在庚寅，九月九日上甲直辰，元始天王长斋上清宫，盟无上无巅、无色无影、无形无名、无祖无极，洞明高上自然无数劫。 道受《三元玉检文》三天玉童，使付后学，有玄名应为上清真人者，定名於丹台金藏玉策，紫文琼札，奉迎圣君，飞行上清宫，俯仰洞清自然官号，侍卫上真，检天检地检人，招仙制魔役灵，降致云车，奉迎受法之身，如九真玄科盟文。 无上洞清混沌自然左灵飞仙，虚侍郎九千人； 无上洞清混沌自然右灵飞仙，虚侍郎九千人。 符并青书。 高上空玄元始丈人道君， 讳 混。 高上九玄元始天王道君， 讳 洞。 高上太空九天丈人道君， 讳 开。 高上玄虚九天真王道君， 讳 羽。 高上空洞混沌九天元父道君， 讳 道。 高上空虚自然九天真母道君， 讳 沌。 高上玉宝九霄天真丈人道君， 讳 窥。 高上紫虚瑛九霄太空玉皇道君， 讳 喘。 高上玉虚万始先生道君， 讳 浪 澜。 郁单无量天王道君， 讳 均 罗。 上上禅善无量寿天王道君， 讳 阳 均 勒。 梵监天王道君， 讳 是 头 元缺。 兜术天王道君， 讳 祖 皈 庆。 不骄乐天道君， 讳 特。 化应声天王道君， 讳 韩 越。 梵宝天王道君， 讳 务 梓。 梵摩伽夷天王道君， 讳 凝 弘。 波利答和天王道君， 讳 灵 渊。 玉清三天丈人道君， 讳 定 枚。 玉清三天玉童道君， 讳 正 览。 玉清高上虚皇道君， 讳 造。 玉清紫虚高上元皇道君， 讳 基。 玉清上皇玉虚道君， 讳 欣。 玉清洞虚三元太朗上皇道君， 讳 欣 平。 玉清皇上玉帝道君， 讳 宁。 玉清太素高虚上极紫皇道君， 讳 怜。 玉清虚明紫兰元中高嵉真皇道君， 讳 知。 紫虚玉皇先生紫晨道君， 讳 齐。 紫虚三元紫精道君， 讳 辉。 紫虚真阳元老玄一道君， 讳 爓 紫虚上皇先生紫晨道君， 讳 欣 三 洞。 紫虚皇上大帝道君， 讳 谷。 紫虚皇老上帝道君， 讳 盈。 紫虚清灵阳安宅元道君， 讳 法。 紫虚皇清洞真道君， 讳 综。 紫虚元灵高上太素道君， 讳 通。 紫虚北玄高上虚皇道君， 讳 桐。 紫虚南朱高上虚皇道君， 讳 景。 紫清西华高上虚皇道君， 讳 拌。 紫清东明高上虚皇道君， 讳 昌。 紫清中元含灵虚皇道君， 讳 澄。 紫清五灵七明混生高上虚皇道君， 讳 珠。 紫虚三元无上玄老虚皇元晨道君， 讳 映。 紫清玄寂九元无上虚皇道君， 讳 师。 紫清太明灵耀中真无上道君， 讳 庆。 高清三元四极玄元虚皇之云道君， 讳 翁。 高清三元晨中黄景虚皇元台道君， 讳 京。

chunks.original_text: 无上洞清混沌自然东方青帝元皇太真九千人，无上洞清混沌自然南方赤帝元皇太真九千人，无上洞清混沌自然西方白帝元皇太真九千人，无上洞清混沌自然北方黑帝元皇太真九千人， 无上洞清混沌自然中央黄帝元皇太真九千人，无上洞清混沌自然左灵领仙玉郎吏各九千人，无上洞清混沌自然右灵领仙玉郎吏各九千人，无上洞清混沌自然九玄上灵飞龙功曹九千人， 无上洞清混沌自然九玄上灵飞仙功曹九千人，无上洞清混沌自然九玄上灵上元功曹九千人，无上洞清混沌自然九玄上灵中元功曹九千人，无上洞清混沌自然九玄上灵下元功曹九千人， 无上洞清混沌自然九玄上清玉虚飞仙使者九千人，无上洞清混沌自然上清玉虚飞仙玉郎九千人，无上洞清混沌自然上清玉虚使者各九千人，无上洞清混沌自然上清玉虚使者、太仙使者各九千人， 无上洞清混沌自然上清玉虚上元使者九千人，无上洞清混沌自然上清玉虚中元使者九千人，无上洞清混沌自然上清玉虚下元使者九千人，无上洞清混沌自然玉清金晨玉童各九千人， 无上洞清混沌自然玉清太华玉女各九千人，无上洞清混沌自然玉清上真辅仙各九千人。 高上洞清紫虚空洞自然飞霄玉仙之气九万重，高上洞清紫虚空洞自然三素飞云之烟九万重，高上洞清紫虚空洞自然五色流霞飞烟九万重，高上洞清紫虚空洞自然青帝飞轮流烟九万重，高上洞清紫虚空洞自然赤帝飞轮流烟九万重，高上洞清紫虚空洞自然白帝飞轮流烟九万重，高上洞清紫虚空洞自然黑帝飞轮流烟九万重，高上洞清紫虚空洞自然黄帝飞轮流烟九万重，高上洞清紫虚空洞自然青帝飞琼羽盖九万重，高上洞清紫虚空洞自然赤帝飞琼羽盖九万重，高上洞清紫虚空洞自然白帝飞琼羽盖九万重，高上洞清紫虚空洞自然黑帝飞琼羽盖九万重，高上洞清紫虚空洞自然黄帝飞琼羽盖九万重，高上洞清紫虚空洞东岳绿辕飞軿九万重，高上洞清紫虚空洞南岳丹辕飞耕九万重，高上洞清紫虚空洞西岳素辕飞軿九万重，高上洞清紫虚空洞北岳玄辕飞軿九万重，高上洞清紫虚空洞中岳黄辕飞軿九万重，高上洞清紫虚空洞自然上元玉真气九万重，高上洞清紫虚空洞自然中元玉真气九万重，高上洞清紫虚空洞自然下元玉真气九万重，高上洞清紫虚空洞自然上元君玉真气九万重，高上洞清紫虚空洞自然中元君玉真气九万重，高上洞清紫虚空洞自然下元君玉真气九万重。 九天玄元太空洞虚自然检天辅真飞行骑九亿万众，九天玄元太空洞虚自然检天辅神飞行骑九亿万众，九天玄元太空洞虚自然检天辅帝飞行骑九亿万众，九天玄元太空洞虚自然检天辅灵飞行骑九亿万众，九天玄元太空洞虚自然青帝飞轮策空骑九亿万众，九天玄元太空洞虚自然赤帝飞轮策空骑九亿万众，九天玄元太空洞虚自然白帝飞轮策空骑九亿万众，九天玄元太空洞虚自然黑帝飞轮策空骑九亿万众，九天玄元太空洞虚自然黄帝飞轮策空骑九亿万众，九天玄元太空洞虚自然束岳飞腾空骑九亿万众，九天玄元太空洞虚自然南岳飞腾空骑九亿万众，九天玄元太空洞虚自然西岳飞腾空骑九亿万众，九天玄元太空洞虚自然北岳飞腾空骑九亿万众，九天玄元太空洞虚自然中岳飞腾空骑九亿万众，九天玄元太空洞虚自然飞辕绿軿策辔骑九亿万众，九天玄元太空洞虚自然飞辕羽盖策辔骑九亿万众，九天玄元太空洞虚自然飞天制地龙腾骑九亿万众，九天玄元太空洞虚自然飞天招真生芝玉女吏九亿万众，九天玄元太空洞虚自然神真仙吏九亿万众，九天玄元太空洞虚自然神精流光耀电骑九亿万众，九天玄元太空洞虚自然阴精兴云降雨骑九亿万众，九天玄元太空洞虚自然云门执节命光骑九亿万众，九天玄元太空洞虚自然阳明耀激逐电骑九亿万众。
